dct_title_s: Stannard & Son's, perspective view of Ashantee & the whole of the Gold Coast
dct_description_sm: compiled from Captain Glovers survey and all the latest offical sources ; drawn and lithographed by Alfred Concanen.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, proposed railway lines, roads, travel routes, kingdom territory lines.
Inset map: A perspective view of the sea board, from the British Isles to the Gold Coast of West Africa.
dct_publisher_sm: Printed & published as the act directs by Stannard & Son, 7, Poland St. Oxford St. London, W.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
